Package dal.versedal

Interface IVerseDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
VerseDAO
public interface IVerseDAO
The IVerseDAO interface defines methods for interacting with the data access layer to manage verses in the Encyclopedia of Arabic Poetry application.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

    Adds a verse to a poem.

  • Method Details

    • addVerse

      void addVerse(int poemId, String firstverse, String secondverse) throws SQLException
      Adds a verse to a poem.
      Parameters:
      poemId - The ID of the poem.
      firstverse - The first verse.
      secondverse - The second verse.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • updateVerse

      void updateVerse(int poemId, String firstVerse, String secondVerse, String firstUpdated, String secondUpdated)
      Updates a verse in a poem.
      Parameters:
      poemId - The ID of the poem.
      firstVerse - The original first verse.
      secondVerse - The original second verse.
      firstUpdated - The updated first verse.
      secondUpdated - The updated second verse.

    • deleteVerse

      void deleteVerse(int poemId, String FirstVerse, String SecondVerse)
      Deletes a verse from a poem.
      Parameters:
      poemId - The ID of the poem.
      FirstVerse - The first verse.
      SecondVerse - The second verse.

    • getVersesByPoem

      List<String[]> getVersesByPoem(int poemId)
      Retrieves a list of verses for a given poem.
      Parameters:
      poemId - The ID of the poem.
      Returns:
      A list of String arrays representing verses.

    • getVerseIdFromTitle

      int getVerseIdFromTitle(String firstVerse, String secondVerse)
      Retrieves the ID of a verse based on its title.
      Parameters:
      firstVerse - The first verse.
      secondVerse - The second verse.
      Returns:
      The ID of the verse.

    • getVersesFromId

      List<String> getVersesFromId(int verseId)
      Retrieves a list of verses based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      verseId - The ID of the verse.
      Returns:
      A list of verses as strings.

    • getVersesByRoot

      List<String[]> getVersesByRoot(int rootId)
      Retrieves a list of verses for a given root.
      Parameters:
      rootId - The ID of the root.
      Returns:
      A list of String arrays representing verses.
